summary: A trio of young men (Griffin, Anderson, and Imperioli) are forced to grow up quick when their girlfriends all become pregnant around the same time.
cast: Eddie Griffin|Anthony Anderson|Michael Imperioli|Paula Jai Parker|Joanna Bacalso|Bai Ling|Marsha Thomason|Bobb'e J. Thompson|Dee Freeman|Randy Sklar|Jason Sklar|Naomi Gaskin|Denis Akiyama|Fred Lee|Wynne Pon|Mung-Ling Tsui|Method Man|Amy Sedaris|Mark Chalant Phifer|John Amos|Russell Peters|Young Dre|Tom Lister Jr.|Jeanettea Antonio|Jordan Madley|Kardinal Offishall|Scott Thompson|Quancetia Hamilton|Jude Coffey|Michie Mee|Bryan Ho|Jason Burke|Rudy Webb|Sal Scozzari|Isaiah Hooper|Daya Vaidya|Lara Vaidya|Barrington Bignall|Raphael Brown|Daniel Solomon|Kojenwa Moitt|Kira Clavell|Storm Ascher|Elle Downs|Riele Downs|Neil Green|Panou|Genelle Williams
title: My Baby's Daddy
